property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you. {T}: Add {C}{C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many of the ancient civilizations beneath Ixalan were destroyed by outside forces. Others tapped into power they found they could not control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you. {T}: Add {C}{C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many of the ancient civilizations beneath Ixalan were destroyed by outside forces. Others tapped into power they found they could not control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you. {T}: Add {C}{C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many of the ancient civilizations beneath Ixalan were destroyed by outside forces. Others tapped into power they found they could not control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you. {T}: Add {C}{C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many of the ancient civilizations beneath Ixalan were destroyed by outside forces. Others tapped into power they found they could not control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Merfolk get +1/+1 and have islandwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever one or more Pirates you control deal damage to your opponents, you create a Treasure token for each opponent dealt damage. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.") Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, if Bridge from Below is in your graveyard, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. When a creature is put into an opponent's graveyard from the battlefield, if Bridge from Below is in your graveyard, exile Bridge from Below.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Each creature you control is a Vampire in addition to its other creature types and has "Whenever this creature deals damage to a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature you control dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The trick to getting the biggest share is to be the last one standing."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace Whenever one or more Pirates you control deal damage to your opponents, exile the top card of each of those opponents' libraries. You may play those cards this turn, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice any number of artifacts and/or creatures. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each permanent sacrificed this way and {2} less to cast for each other artifact or creature you've sacrificed this turn. Trample Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace Players can't gain life. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, Rampaging Ferocidon deals 1 damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unlike their pack-hunting kin, ferocidons stalk in solitude and lash out at everything that approaches.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each nonland card in your graveyard has escape. The escape cost is equal to the card's mana cost plus exile three other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast cards from your graveyard for their escape cost.) At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Underworld Breach.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Trample, hexproof

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Outsiders may marvel at the Sun Empire's "domesticated" dinosaurs, but those who live alongside them know they can never truly be tamed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total power of creatures you control. Trample

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enrage - Whenever Polyraptor is dealt damage, create a token that's a copy of Polyraptor.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you see one, you're already surrounded.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast your first instant spell each turn, if Kalamax, the Stormsire is tapped, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. Whenever you copy an instant spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Kalamax.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Discard a card, then draw a card. If a land card is discarded this way, draw an additional card. −3: Return up to two target land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. −11: Destroy up to six target nonland permanents, then create six 2/2 green Cat Warrior creature tokens with forestwalk. Lord Windgrace can be your commander.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Whenever Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist attacks, each opponent can't block with more than one creature this combat. As long as Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist is tapped, no more than one creature can attack you each combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}: Scry 1, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped. Otherwise, draw a card. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When you go where the currents take you, you'll never run short of things to discover."

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you. {T}: Add {C}{C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many of the ancient civilizations beneath Ixalan were destroyed by outside forces. Others tapped into power they found they could not control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you. {T}: Add {C}{C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many of the ancient civilizations beneath Ixalan were destroyed by outside forces. Others tapped into power they found they could not control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you. {T}: Add {C}{C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many of the ancient civilizations beneath Ixalan were destroyed by outside forces. Others tapped into power they found they could not control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Star Compass enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add one mana of any color that a basic land you control could produce.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card from their hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Morbid - That creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead if a creature died this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose two target creature cards in your graveyard. Sacrifice a creature. If you do, return the chosen cards to the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, discard a card at random, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Suspend 4 - {G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay {G} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.) Create two 4/4 green Rhino creature tokens with trample.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") Whenever you sacrifice a Clue, put a +1/+1 counter on Tireless Tracker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Counter target spell with mana value less than or equal to the number of cards in its controller's graveyard. • Destroy target creature with mana value less than or equal to the number of cards in its controller's graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Field of the Dead enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}. Whenever Field of the Dead or another land enters the battlefield under your control, if you control seven or more lands with different names, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Stoneforge Mystic enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. {1}{W}, {T}: You may put an Equipment card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Flash Flying Brazen Borrower can block only creatures with flying. //
Return target nonland permanent an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. If an artifact or creature spell is countered this way, put that card onto the battlefield under your control instead of into its owner's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is one thing to run away. It is quite another to escape your fate." - Oko

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one or more other creatures die, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's downright selfish to die with full pockets."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Port Razer deals combat damage to a player, untap each creature you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase. Port Razer can't attack a player it has already attacked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We're taking back what's ours. And a little bit of what's yours."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice any number of lands. Search your library for up to that many land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These people come from their cities and think to tame the wilderness. They forget that here, the wilderness has a head start." - Selvala

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Mystic Snake enters the battlefield, counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Travelers who have reached the headwaters of Fool's Fall say that strange serpents dwell in the waters there, though none can recall any more than that.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash If an opponent would draw a card except the first one they draw in each of their draw steps, instead that player skips that draw and you draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All these childhood memories are getting in the way of the vault codes."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Desert deals 1 damage to target attacking creature. Activate only during the end of combat step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only a fool goes out there unprepared. If the heat doesn't get you, the time alone with your thoughts likely will." - Ertha Jo, frontier mentor

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Prismatic Vista: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Kellan let his eyes wander to the horizon, he saw a land whose destiny was as uncertain as his own.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({C} represents colorless mana.) When Thought-Knot Seer enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it and exile that card. When Thought-Knot Seer leaves the battlefield, target opponent draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its gaze gifts you with knowledge no mortal mind should possess.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Converge - Exile target nonland permanent if its mana value is less than or equal to the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sagas sing of realms long forgotten, shattered by doomskars and cleansed violently from the World Tree.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({PB} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.) Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No one has heard Drivnod speak. But we have seen him do unspeakable things. As he drifts over Ish Sah, a deathly whisper rides the wind. I can never watch for long - I turn away and hide." - Kara Vrist, resistance spymaster

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target nonlegendary creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I paid a price to one I will not name to escape the abyss. A bit of my soul for a second chance. And I'd do it again ,and again - until I had no soul left to trade." - Tinna, Skirsdag cultist

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand, put one of them on the bottom of your library, and exile one of them. You may play the exiled card this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Art exposes truth. Each step of my dance brings me closer to the secrets of the universe."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Lifelink When Solitude enters the battlefield, exile up to one other target creature. That creature's controller gains life equal to its power. Evoke - Exile a white card from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Flying When Subtlety enters the battlefield, choose up to one target creature spell or planeswalker spell. Its owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library. Evoke - Exile a blue card from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace When Grief enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. Evoke - Exile a black card from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double strike When Fury enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or planeswalkers. Evoke - Exile a red card from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Reach When Endurance enters the battlefield, up to one target player puts all the cards from their graveyard on the bottom of their library in a random order. Evoke - Exile a green card from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Lifelink When Solitude enters the battlefield, exile up to one other target creature. That creature's controller gains life equal to its power. Evoke - Exile a white card from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Flying When Subtlety enters the battlefield, choose up to one target creature spell or planeswalker spell. Its owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library. Evoke - Exile a blue card from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace When Grief enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. Evoke - Exile a black card from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double strike When Fury enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or planeswalkers. Evoke - Exile a red card from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Reach When Endurance enters the battlefield, up to one target player puts all the cards from their graveyard on the bottom of their library in a random order. Evoke - Exile a green card from your hand.
